text.name: sys_description
text.text: Open Beats of Rage is a free game engine suited for beat'em up styled games, inspired heavily from Sega's Streets of Rage series. Originally created by Senile Team in 2004 as Beats of Rage, Kirby2000 asked Senile Team to distribute the source code in 2005. They agreed and OpenBoR was born, with its development continuing to this very day by a community on the Lavalit site. Streets of Rage 2X is its most infamous game, featuring remakes of SoR 1/2's levels with the sprites from the King of Fighters series.
